skills.label: Support Microsoft Store, Microsoft Store for Education, Microsoft Store for Business, and cloud apps.
items: Install and manage software by using microsoft office 365, microsoft store for business apps, or microsoft store for education apps
Sideload apps by using microsoft intune
Sideload apps into online and offline images
Deeplink apps by using microsoft intune
Integrate microsoft account, including personalization settings

skills.label: Support authentication and authorization.
items: Identify and resolve issues related to multi-factor authentication, windows hello for business, virtual smart cards, picture passwords, and biometrics
Configure computer and user authentication using secure channel, account policies, credential caching, and credential manager
Implement local accounts and microsoft accounts
Connect microsoft accounts to domain accounts

skills.label: Migrate and configure user data.
items: Configure profiles, including profile version, local, roaming, and mandatory

skills.label: Configure Hyper-V.
items: Create and configure virtual machines including integration services

skills.label: Configure mobility options.
items: Configure offline file policies, power policies (powercfg), windows to go, sync options, sync center, and wi-fi direct

label: Plan and Implement a Microsoft 365 Solution (10-15%)

skills.label: Support mobile devices.
items: Support mobile device policies including security policies, remote access, and remote wipe
Support mobile access and data synchronization including work folders and sync center
Support broadband connectivity including broadband tethering and metered networks
Support mobile device management by using microsoft intune including, windows 10, windows 10 mobile, ios, and android

skills.label: Deploy software updates by using Microsoft Intune.
items: Use reports and in-console monitoring to identify required updates

skills.label: Manage devices with Microsoft 365 Solution.
items: View and manage all managed devices
Configure the microsoft service connection point role

skills.label: Configure information protection.
items: Manage and configure office 365 data loss prevention, windows information protection and bitlocker, azure information protection, microsoft cloud app security, office 365 advanced security management

skills.label: Configure and maintain network security.
items: Configure windows firewall with advanced security

skills.label: Support data storage.
items: Identify and resolve issues related to the following: dfs client including caching settings
Storage spaces including capacity and fault tolerance

skills.label: Support data security.
items: Identify and resolve issues related to the following: permissions including share, ntfs, and dynamic access control (dac)
Encrypting file system (efs) including data recovery agent
Bitlocker and bitlocker to go including data recovery agent and microsoft bitlocker administration and monitoring (mbam)

skills.label: Configure file and folder access.
items: Encrypt files and folders by using efs
Configure file access auditing configure authentication and authorization.

skills.label: Configure remote connections.
items: Configure remote desktop client for windows 10 mobile, ios, and android
Protect remote desktop credentials with remote credential guard
Enable restricted admin mode for rdp in windows 8.1 and windows 2012 r2

skills.label: Deploy and manage RemoteApp
items: Configure remoteapp and desktop connections settings, configure group policy objects (gpos) for signed packages, subscribe to the desktop connections feeds, export and import remoteapp configurations, support ios and android, configure remote desktop web access for distribution

skills.label: Support desktop apps.
items: Support desktop app compatibility using windows assessment and deployment kit (adk)
Desktop application co-existence using hyper-v and app-v
Deploy desktop apps by using microsoft intune

skills.label: Configure file recovery.
items: Restore previous versions of files and folders
